casebody.data:
No. 674. A. M. Hastings, Administrator, Petitioner, v. Southern Railway Company. April 16, 1906. Mr. J. Altheus Johnson and Mr. Joseph A. McCullough for petitioner. Mr. George E. Hamilton and Mr. M. J.. Colbert for respondent.

Petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
